 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָטַף‎</span>] **verb** ==turn aside== (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***turn, return***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***incline, bend***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲטֹף‎</span> ***turn aside*** (so [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]<sup>Kau</sup> and others), [[Job.23.9|Job 23:9]] ***he turneth aside*** to the right (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמִין‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂמאֹול בַּעֲשׂתוֺ‎</span>), read probably 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶעֱטֹף‎</span> [[BDB#Me|Me]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Du|Du]], ***I turn***... and do not see him ( and \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּקַּשְׁתִּו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>). 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָטַף‎</span>] **verb** ==envelop oneself== (Aramaism) (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֲטַף‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***covered***, also noun ***web, texture***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲטָףֿ‎</span> [[Ps.73.6|Ps 73:6]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעַטְפוּ‎</span> [[Ps.65.14|Ps 65:14]] — ***envelop oneself:*** [[Ps.65.15|Ps 65:15]] ***the valleys cover themselves with corn*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבַשׁ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִֿׁית חָמָס לָ֑מוֺ‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַ‎</span> [[Ps.73.6|Ps 73:6]] ***they put on for themselves*** (each) ***a garb of violence.*** 



 III. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָטַף‎</span>] **verb** ==be feeble, faint== ([[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 27</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***perish, flag***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲטֹף‎</span> [[Ps.102.1|Ps 102:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲטוֺף‎</span> [[Isa.57.16|Isa 57:16]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲטֹף‎</span> [[Ps.61.3|Ps 61:3]] ***Passive participle*** ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:50f»§ 50f</sup>) plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲטֻפִים‎</span> [[Gen.30.42|Gen 30:42]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲטוּפִים‎</span> [[Lam.2.19|Lam 2:19]] — literally ***be feeble*** [[Gen.30.42|Gen 30:42]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְשׁוּרִים‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֲטוּפִים בְּרָעָב‎</span> [[Lam.2.19|Lam 2:19]] figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ מִלָּפָנַי יַע‎</span> [[Isa.57.16|Isa 57:16]] ***the spirit would faint before me*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲטֹף לִבִּי‎</span> [[Ps.61.3|Ps 61:3]]; [[Ps.101.2|Ps 101:2]] (title). **Niph\`al** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּעָטֵף עוֺלֵל‎</span> [[Lam.2.11|Lam 2:11]] ***when infants faint*** (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהֵע‎</span>; but read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲטֹף‎</span> **Qal**, so [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]). **Hiph\`il** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהַעֲטִיף הַצּאֹן‎</span> [[Gen.30.42|Gen 30:42]] when the flock ***shewed feebleness.*** **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְעַטֵף‎</span> [[Ps.77.4|Ps 77:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּת‎</span> [[Ps.143.4|Ps 143:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְעַטָ֑ף‎</span> [[Ps.107.5|Ps 107:5]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַטֵּף‎</span> [[Ps.142.4|Ps 142:4]]; [[Jonah.2.8|Jonah 2:8]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַטְּפָם‎</span> [[Lam.2.12|Lam 2:12]] — ***faint, faint away***, [[Lam.2.12|Lam 2:12]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּחָלָל‎</span> ***like the wounded***); subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ‎</span> [[Ps.77.4|Ps 77:4]]; [[Ps.142.4|Ps 142:4]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַי‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> **II 1 d**), [[Ps.143.4|Ps 143:4]] (+ ***id.***); subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ‎</span> [[Jonah.2.8|Jonah 2:8]] (+ ***id.***), [[Ps.107.5|Ps 107:5]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּהֶם‎</span>).
